name: Kill All Orcs
description:
Kill a bunch of orcs with guns. More orcs (as well as new guns and lives) arrive every 10 seconds. That's it. Has controller support but not for the UI.

Controls

- WASD (or Left Stick) to move

- Mouse (or Right Stick) to aim

- Left Click (or Right Bumper) to fire

- R (or B button) to reload

- Scroll (or X and Y buttons) to cycle through weapons
